advanceMarketEpoch(bytes32).details: Only callable by contract ownerOnly works for manual epoch markets (epochDuration = 0)

batchClaimWinnings((bytes32,uint256,uint.details: Processes all valid claims and skips invalid ones, enabling users to claim all winnings efficiently

params.claims: Array of claim requests for different markets/epochs

returns.totalPayout: Total payout amount transferred to user across all claims (after fees)

batchSetMarketTradingPaused(bytes32[],bo.details: Only callable by contract owner, gas-efficient for bulk updates

params.paused: True to pause trading, false to resume

returns._0: Payout amount transferred to user (after fees)

createMarket(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Only callable by contract ownerFor continuous markets, set resolutionTime=0 and epochDuration>0 (e.g., 86400 for daily)

params.epochDuration: Duration of each epoch in seconds (0 for manual epoch advancement)
params.outcomeCount: Number of possible outcomes for this market
params.resolutionTime: Timestamp when market should resolve (0 for manual resolution)

emergencyResolveMarket(bytes32,uint256,b.details: Can only be called after resolution time has passed, provides fallback resolution

params.merkleRoot: Root hash of merkle tree containing valid outcomes
params.numberOfOutcomes: Number of possible outcomes for validation

params.fillAmount: Amount to fill (must not exceed either order)

returns._0: Fee rate in basis points that will be applied to this user
True if all trading is paused
True if trading is active (not paused globally or for this market)
True if trading is paused for this market

setFeeRate(uint256).details: Only callable by contract owner, maximum 10000 basis points (100%)

setGlobalTradingPaused(bool).details: Only callable by contract owner, affects all markets

params.paused: True to pause all trading, false to resume

setMarketTradingPaused(bytes32,bool).details: Only callable by contract owner, for trading hours control

params.paused: True to pause trading, false to resume

setUserFeeRate(address,uint256).details: Only callable by contract owner, allows preferential rates for MMs/whales

params._feeRate: Custom fee rate in basis points (0 = use default rate)

updateMarketResolutionTime(bytes32,uint2.details: Only callable by contract owner, only before current resolution time

params.resolutionTime: New resolution timestamp (0 for manual resolution)

returns._0: Custom fee rate (0 if using default)

advanceMarketEpoch(bytes32).notice: Advances market to next epoch for continuous markets

authorizedMatchers(address).notice: Checks if address is authorized to execute matching operations

batchClaimWinnings((bytes32,uint256,uint.notice: Claims winnings from multiple resolved markets in a single transaction

batchSetMarketTradingPaused(bytes32[],bo.notice: Sets trading pause state for multiple markets (batch operation)

cancelOrder((address,bytes32,uint256,uin.notice: Allows users to cancel their own orders

createMarket(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Creates a new prediction market with optional time-based resolution

emergencyResolveMarket(bytes32,uint256,b.notice: Emergency function to resolve markets that have passed their resolution time

executeOrderMatch((address,bytes32,uint2.notice: Executes a trade using EIP-712 signed orders

executeSingleOrder((address,bytes32,uint.notice: Executes a single signed order against matcher's liquidity

getEffectiveFeeRate(address).notice: Gets the effective fee rate for a user

getOrderFillAmount(bytes32).notice: Check how much of an order has been filled

getOrderHash((address,bytes32,uint256,ui.notice: Get the EIP-712 hash for an order

getOrderRemainingAmount((address,bytes32.notice: Check remaining amount for an order

isTradingActive(bytes32).notice: Checks if trading is active for a specific market

setAuthorizedMatcher(address,bool).notice: Sets authorization status for off-chain matching systems

setFeeRate(uint256).notice: Sets the default fee rate for winnings claims

setGlobalTradingPaused(bool).notice: Sets global trading pause state (emergency stop)

setMarketTradingPaused(bytes32,bool).notice: Sets trading pause state for specific market

setTreasury(address).notice: Sets the treasury address where fees are sent

setUserFeeRate(address,uint256).notice: Sets a custom fee rate for specific user (fee tier system)

updateMarketResolutionTime(bytes32,uint2.notice: Updates resolution time for existing market

userFeeRate(address).notice: Returns custom fee rate for a user
